attributes.action: abolish the idea of granting £700 for children who don't have computers at home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM has announced that he is to spend £300million for children who don't already have internet access at home.  This is to the cost of the tax payer and £300million could be spent better elsewhere.  Why can't these children use the facilities at libraries and schools, which is much more beneficial to more people.  Also who is to say that the access to internet at home will prove productive to the children as we cannot guaruntee that it will not be abused.
